articles.title: Vedanta emerges preferred bidder for minerals block in Chattisgarh - Moneycontrol
articles.description: In October last year, the Chhattisgarh government had conducted an auction for grant of composite license for the mineral block.
articles.content:
Vedanta Ltd on Thursday said it has been declared as the preferred bidder for nickel, chromium and associated platinum group elements block in Chhattisgarh.
